children.description: Fired when validation completes.The event handler function context (available via the `this` keyword) will be set to the data source instance.

children.name: validateInput
children.description: Validates the input element against the declared validation rules.

children.name: validate
children.description: Validates the input element(s) against the declared validation rules.

children.name: errors
children.description: Get the error messages if any.

children.name: validateOnBlur
children.description: Determines if validation will be triggered when element loses focus. Default value is true.

children.name: rules
children.description: Set of custom validation rules. Those rules will extend the [built-in ones](/framework/validator/overview#default-validation-rules).

children.name: messages
children.description: Set of messages (either strings or functions) which will be shown when given validation rule fails.By setting already existing key the appropriate built-in message will be overridden.

children.name: errorTemplate
children.description: The [template](/api/javascript/kendo#methods-template) which renders the validation message.
